declarations.description:

```js 
import '@capitec/omni-components/button';
```

cssProperties.description: Slot margin top (When positioned bottom of label).
cssProperties.name: --omni-button-slot-margin-top

declarations.description:
A control to syntax highlight and display source code.

```js 
import '@capitec/omni-components/code'; 
```
declarations.name: Code

members.name: header
members.description: Renders a small header above the block itself.

members.name: language
members.description: Programming language used, e.g. html, css, javascript, etc.

members.name: content
members.description: Raw text to parse as content. If this property is specified, it will take precedence over slotted content. This should also be used if you are using dynamic content

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: Renders a small header above the block itself.

attributes.description: Programming language used, e.g. html, css, javascript, etc.

declarations.description:
A link control that allows a user to indicate an action to be executed. Typically used for navigational purposes.

```js 
import '@capitec/omni-components/hyperlink'; 
```

declarations.name: ifNotEmpty
declarations.description: Lit directive that only applies when provided value is not falsy(undefined, null, or empty string)

declarations.name: raw
declarations.description:
Interprets a template literal as a raw HTML string. ```ts const header = (title: string) => raw`

${title}

`; ``` The `raw` tag returns a string that can be used directly as ```innerHTML``` or as ```unsafeHTML``` via lit.
